titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Honorable House of Commons, at their monethly fast, May 29. 1644. By Peter Smith Doctor of Divinitie, minister of Gods Word at Barkway in Hertfordshire, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Peter, d. 1652? or 3?
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for Christopher Meredith, at the sign of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon at the monethly fast, May 29. 1644. to the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
